name: HopeRadio
0:
”Alexa, ask hope radio to play hope radio”
”Alexa, ask hope radio to stop the radio”
”Alexa, open hope radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hope radio
des:
At Hope Radio, where every voice matters and every story inspires! In a world filled with challenges, Hope Radio Station stands as a beacon of positivity and inspiration. From heartwarming interviews to community outreach, we connect people, foster hope, and uplift spirits.

Oneway Broadcasting Network is a non-profit, free-to-air television network. The gospel is an essential message that resonates with every single individual. It is our divine duty to embrace this calling and proclaim the good news to all.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
